forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West northwest wind 7 to 17 mph.

weather_report:
The night in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a gentle clarity, the sky becoming a canvas of mostly clear darkness, cradling temperatures hovering just around 49 degrees. A brisk west-northwest wind dances through the city, lending a chill that whispers of the forthcoming day. As dawn approaches, the promise of sunshine materializes; Sunday beckons with a welcoming warmth, a high near 65, enabling the city to bask in a golden glow amidst the gentle stir of winds 7 to 17 mph.

While the tranquility of the night envelops the city, one can only imagine the fabric of the day ahead—brightly illuminated by sunbeams yet unobstructed by fog or marine layer, hinting at perfect opportunities for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or lazing about in one of the many inviting parks. The absence of fog lays the landscape bare for exploration, urging residents and visitors alike to don light layers paired with a sweater, perhaps a shawl for the early morning air, before soaking up the sunshine as the hours pass. Consider heading to a nearby café for a warm brew or a hearty breakfast while the city comes alive, then venture out, perhaps to the Embarcadero, where the views stretch across the Bay, celebrating the mood this splendid day has to offer.
